title: Admission Notice for B.Tech Programs 2024-25
description: Applications are invited for admission to B.Tech programs for the academic year 2024-25. Eligible candidates may apply online through the university portal.

title: Walk-in Interview for Assistant Professor Positions
description: Walk-in interview for the post of Assistant Professor in various departments will be held on November 5, 2024. Candidates should bring all original documents.

title: Mid-Semester Examination Schedule
description: The mid-semester examinations for all programs will commence from November 10, 2024. Students are advised to check the detailed schedule on the examination portal.

title: Fee Payment Deadline Extended
description: The last date for fee payment for the current semester has been extended to October 31, 2024 without late fee charges.

title: Workshop on Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning
description: A three-day workshop on AI and ML will be conducted from November 15-17, 2024. Interested students can register through the university website.

title: PhD Admission Notification
description: Applications are invited for admission to PhD programs in various disciplines for January 2025 session.

title: Annual Sports Meet 2024
description: The annual sports meet will be held from December 5-8, 2024. All students are encouraged to participate in various sporting events.

title: Scholarship Application for Meritorious Students
description: Eligible students can apply for merit-based scholarships for the current academic year. Last date for submission is November 15, 2024.
